title: Jazz Willisau:  Don Pullen Quartet
description: Black hands with purple fingernails on yellow background at bottom, reaching up and playing black and white piano keys. Black keys become same purple as fingernails and extend up towards top of poster, becoming stripes on american flag. Flag's stars are white on darker purple background in top right corner. Text at bottom between hands: "1.April Willisau, Don pullen Quartet featuring Chico Freeman, Fred Hopkins, Bobby Battle, Hotel Mohren 20 Uhr."
name: Poster
